snippet: A lawsuit brought by a pregnant inmate seeking access to an abortion was dismissed by a federal judge on Friday after the woman said she had changed her mind and would carry the child.
abstract: Judge Abdul K Kallon of Federal District Court in Alabama dismisses lawsuit brought by Lauderdale County detention center inmate seeking medical furlough to have abortion after she tells court she has changed her mind and wants to carry baby to full term.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit brought by a pregnant inmate seeking access to an abortion was dismissed by a federal judge on Friday after the woman said she had changed her mind and would carry the child.

headline.main: Inmate’s Suit Over Abortion Denial Ends With Her Decision to Have Child
headline.print_headline: Inmate’s Suit Over Denial of Abortion Ends With Her Decision to Have Child
